# Staff Members

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/help-articles/staff-members/

## Category
09 Staff And Payroll

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
STAFF MEMBERS
Staff Members

The articles in this section cover staff member settings, including adding a staff member, managing staff member work hours, staff compensation, and more.

To learn more about staff management, watch our on-demand Staff Management video.

In this section:
Adding and Inviting Staff Members
Staff Member Notifications
Enabling Desktop Notifications
Staff Member Permissions
Staff Member Work Hours & Days Off
Staff Member Compensation
Time Clock
Resetting Passwords
Archiving a Staff Member
Viewing Your Daily and Weekly Totals
Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
